content: Visiting SS Hyderabad Biriyani was like a delightful journey back to the streets of Hyderabad! Each bite of their biriyani was a burst of rich flavors, reminiscent of my favorite food memories.
author: Priyanka

content: Trying the Mattas Veg Balls at was a revelation! These crispy, flavorful bites were a perfect vegetarian delight, bursting with spices and textures that left me craving more.
author: Latha Lakshmi

content: The authentic veg Dishes are available at hotel Sairam.One Of the best dishes is Kaddai Panner.. Dont miss it guys.....
author: Dhinakar

content: Domino's Margherita Pizza is a classic favorite for a reason! The simplicity of fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil on a crispy crust is perfection. Each bite delivers a comforting, cheesy goodness that's hard to resist.
author: Ranjana

content: Tasting Dragon Chicken at Beach Station was a fiery adventure! The crispy chicken, coated in a sweet and spicy sauce with a hint of garlic, was an explosion of flavors. It's a must-try for those who love bold, vibrant dishes!
author: Monisha

content: Thalappakatti is famous for their biriyani's which is made by a special blend of spices. They use little pearl rice, which differs from all other biriyani's out there, the rice is well cooked , they use ghee in right amount that gives a special touch for the dish , the pieces are very tender and juicy with good amount of masala. I have tried their Chicken biriyani and one word I can put on it is " It's fabulousðŸ¤— ". I Loved It!.....make a try, you too can ðŸ˜Š
author: Chitesh
